title: Commission Regulation (EEC) No 1532/86 of 21 May 1986 re-establishing the levying of customs duties applicable to microwave ovens, falling within subheading 85.12 E ex II, originating in South Korea, to which the preferential tariff arrangements set out in Council Regulation (EEC) No 3599/85 apply
header:
COMMISSION  REGULATION (EEC) No 1532/86
of 21 May 1986
re-establishing the levying of customs duties applicable to microwave ovens, falling within subheading 85.12 E ex II, originating in South Korea, to which the preferential tariff arrangements set out in Council Regulation (EEC) No 3599/85 apply
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
As from 25 May 1986, the levying of customs duties, suspended pursuant to Council Regulation (EEC) No 3599/85, shall be re-established on imports into the Community of the following products in South Korea:
1.2 //  //  // CCT heading No  // Description  //  //  // 85.12 E ex II (NIMEXE code 85.12-67)   // Microwave ovens   //    //

This Regulation shall enter into force on the third day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 21 May 1986.
For the Commission
COCKFIELD
Vice-President
(1) OJ No L 352, 30. 12. 1985, p. 1.
